name: Robo Encryption Zup
description: Turn off the central system of the consciousness management laboratory. Overcome opponents and reprogram the network of scientific complexes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTS 450 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: You may need to update the driver for your video card and sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 770 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: You may need to update the driver for your video card and sound card
